result.pre: The METADISE code ensures the creation of surfaces with zero
result.post: perpendicular to the surface plane. 31 However, because of

result.pre: carbonate systems, high supersaturation levels lead to the formation of
result.post: precursor phases that transform into the final crystalline product.

result.pre: . Andersen F. A. ; Brecevic L. Infrared spectra of
result.post: and crystalline calcium carbonate . Acta Chem. Scand. 1991,
